name: Feedback Notification
description: Send email notification when customer feedback is submitted

config.subject: New Feedback: {{trigger.form_data.rating}} rating from {{trigger.form_data.name}}
config.body:
You received new customer feedback!

From: {{trigger.form_data.name}} ({{trigger.form_data.email}})

Rating: {{trigger.form_data.rating}}

Would recommend: {{trigger.form_data.recommend}}

Their feedback:

{{trigger.form_data.feedback}}

{{#if trigger.form_data.improvement_feedback}}

What could be better:

{{trigger.form_data.improvement_feedback}}

{{/if}}
